positions.title: Partner
positions.description_html:
-Cross border venture investing and advisory platform between Europe/ USA/UK and India
-Working with leading corporates/family offices and individuals on one side and cutting-edge technology companies on the other
a. Investment in a cutting edge IOT company for logistics based in Silicon Valley
b. Joint venture between a IOT German company for lighting solutions and Bajaj Electric for India
c. Advisory for an Industrial robotics company from Singapore -facilitated investment and India partnerships, clients
d. Advisory for a Logistics tech company from Saudi Arabia for India partnerships/clients
e. Cross border- Worked with a railways company in India to get them access to predictive maintenance technologies
f. Advisory for a leading lighting corporate for access to technology for facade lighting/architectural lighting and India market entry
g. Strategy for an aviation sector focussed logistics company on strategy

experience.title: Founder and Partner
experience.description: -East India's first Structured private accelerator to support start ups through world class mentorship, workshops and access to top investors on a global basis. -STRATEGIC alliance with Applyifi (Gurugram based leading  accelerator manager)-World class advisory board and mentor panel.-Launched Indian Chamber of Commerce Start Up Pad.-Helped Bengal Government organise Start Up theme Pavilion in Bengal Global Business Summit

experience.title: First Co Founder
experience.description: 1. Started from scratch and aggregated angel investors in East India and grew rapidly to become one of the largest angel networks in India.2. Forged tie ups with angel networks/vc funds/HNI's/key decision makers in angel/start up space3. Grew the network to 80 investors4. The network invested in 30 odd companies in 7 years5. Forged global alliances with incubators/networks, educational institutions, Chambers of Commerce, Government and Media.6. Evaluated close to 400 ideas

experience.title: Director
experience.description: active in:-IDEATOR and FIRST Co- Founder: CALCUTTA ANGELS- which grew to become one of the largest angel networks in the country.-Founder: Neoleap Business Accelerator; East India's first private accelerator and organisor of Bengal Global Business Start up Pavilion in 2017. Launched Indian Chamber of Commerce Start Up Pad.-He is passionate about start ups and is a speaker, jury member and activist at IIT Kharagpur, IIM Calcutta and TiE events in Eastern India as well as in Pan India institutes IIM Ahemdabad, IIT Bhubaneshwar, IIT Delhi-CII Innovation Task Force member for 2 years-Partner in Anchor Group, Switzerland which is a boutique investment and advisory firm for series A and B technology companies primarily. Working with large and medium corporates and family offices in India and Europe for the same.-Speaker in Horasis, a global think tank comprising of investors, corporates, entrepreneurs, academics, thought leaders

Launched Indian Chamber of Commerce Start Up Pad.-He is passionate about start ups and is a speaker, jury member and activist at IIT Kharagpur, IIM Calcutta and TiE events in Eastern India as well as in Pan India institutes IIM Ahemdabad, IIT Bhubaneshwar, IIT Delhi-CII Innovation Task Force member for 2 years-Partner in Anchor Group, Switzerland which is a boutique investment and advisory firm for series A and B technology companies primarily. Working with large and medium corporates and family offices in India and Europe for the same.-Speaker in Horasis, a global think tank comprising of investors, corporates, entrepreneurs, academics, thought leaders
